definition: strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

sentences.english: Wishful bullion style head for the clouds, known as "good luck."
sentences.chinese: 如意金銀條頭部爲祥雲造型，稱爲“吉祥如意”。

sentences.english: Ruyi head for gold and silver bar modelling, called "auspicious clouds luck".
sentences.chinese: 如意金銀條頭部爲祥雲造型，稱爲“吉祥如意”。

sentences.english: All day, a steady stream of customers stop in to buy gold and silver bars and coins.
sentences.chinese: 這裏整天都有穩定的客流量前來購買金銀條和錢幣。

sentences.english: S. silver certificate, for example, could be redeemed for an actual piece of silver.
sentences.chinese: 例如，一張美國銀元券能兌換一塊銀條。

sentences.english: Paper money, it seemed, had to be convertible into bullion on demand for it to be accepted.
sentences.chinese: 紙幣似乎必須能即刻兌換成金條銀條才能爲人接受。
